statements: DELETE FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND analysis_date <= '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE post_id = (SELECT post_id FROM blog_posts WHERE post_title = 'Example Title');
DELETE FROM market_insights WHERE analysis_id = 100 AND insight_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM post_sentiments WHERE post_id = 10 AND sentiment_category = 'positive';
DELETE FROM likes WHERE liker_id = 102 AND post_id = 205;
DELETE FROM comments WHERE post_id = 105 AND commenter_name = 'Alice';
